突然离开, 逃离, 逃避, 避免正视

bilingual.source: Yes, I'm going away for a few days.
I'm going to be away for a week in June.
My parents were away for a whole week.
Someday it would be my turn to go away.
My family and I moved away from the beach.
bilingual.target: 我和我的家人离开了海滩。

bilingual.source: I do not understand how long he would be away.
bilingual.target: 我不明白他会离开多久。

bilingual.source: You need to take breaks away from the computer.
bilingual.target: 你需要离开电脑休息一下。

bilingual.source: We have to get away before those men come back.
bilingual.target: 我们必须在那些人回来之前离开。

bilingual.source: We are pulling away from Cape Saint Vincent, lad, the last of Europe.
bilingual.target: 我们正在离开圣文森特角，孩子，这是欧洲的尽头。

bilingual.source: Rosie left the primary school near her home to live at a high school two hours away by bus.
bilingual.target: 罗茜离开了家附近的小学，去了一所坐公交车两个小时的高中。

list.abstract: 《away》是一首英语流行歌曲，由孙坚、郁可唯共同演唱，潘美祎作词，丁可作曲并编曲，发行于2014年8月4日，收录于专辑《Away》中。是郑恺、孙坚领衔主演的2014暑期档爆笑电影《江湖论剑实录》的主题曲。
《AWAY》是一款以大自然为背景的沉浸式动作冒险游戏，于2022年夏季发售。

yingyinNormal.en: And sometimes, I may be away longer like this.
yingyinNormal.zh: 有时我会离开更久，像这样。

yingyinNormal.en: Mommy, are we going away cebause I'm not a monster?
yingyinNormal.zh: 妈咪，我们要离开是因为我不是怪物吗？

yingyinNormal.en: I'm back, aren't I? I hated being away from the city, away from Dan.
yingyinNormal.zh: 可是我回来了，不是吗？我讨厌离开纽约... 离开丹。

yingyinNormal.en: 100 years ago, I walked away from mankind. From a century of horrors.
yingyinNormal.zh: 100年前，我离开了人类，离开了一个世纪的恐怖。

yingyinNormal.en: Wonderful. Now, go away. Hey, I mean it. You've still got it! I'm asking you to leave.
yingyinNormal.zh: 太好了，现在请你离开我是认真的，你还是和以前一样棒。我叫你离开这里得了吧

yingyinNormal.en: You can't take Professor Dumbledore away. Take him away and the Muggle-borns won't stand a chance.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们不能把校长免职。他离开后麻瓜后代就一点希望都没有了。
yingyinNormal.videoNameEn: 《Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets》

yingyinNormal.en: So are you excited about your first night away from Emma?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你很高兴你第一次可以离开艾玛 晚上出去玩吗？

yingyinNormal.en: But then you leave. You leave for college, you leave for New York, and now you're gonna fly across the ocean and take away my grandchildren. Me too, me too.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但是随后你们就会离开。你们离开去上大学，离开去纽约，现在你们又要横跨大西洋，带走我的孙子孙女。还有我，还有我。

yingyinNormal.en: At least you would be away from here. Harry Potter must go home.
yingyinNormal.zh: 至少这样能让你离开这里。哈利·波特必须回家。
yingyinNormal.videoNameEn: 《Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets》

yingyinNormal.en: That wasn't my fault. I wanted to leave right away. With our clients.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那不是我的错，我想立刻就离开的。带着我们的客户。

yingyinNormal.en: Monica, if you could step away, we'll get Chandler and the bridesmaids. Okay.
yingyinNormal.zh: 莫妮卡，请你先离开，我们要拍钱德跟伴娘的合照。好。

yingyinNormal.en: Gone away? Do you know when they'll be back? No. They have already departed.
yingyinNormal.zh: 走了？你知道他们什么时候回来吗？不知道，他们已经离开了。

yingyinNormal.en: A family? Home? Really, I understand. So, just let me get out of here, right? Let me just walk away.
yingyinNormal.zh: 家庭？家园？我理解的。让我走吧，放我离开。

yingyinNormal.en: Ma'am, I'm gonna ask you to step away from the cart and keep your hands where I can see them.
yingyinNormal.zh: 女士，请你离开购物车，把手放在我看得见的地方。

yingyinNormal.en: So, after our stray ran away from camp, looks like these guys got caught in a loop.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那个失散的机器人离开营地后，他们这伙人似乎就一直在兜圈子。

yingyinNormal.en: While angry, I say things some people find hard to forgive. So, I have decided to go away.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我生气时说的话，可能会让一些人很难原谅，所以我决定离开一阵。

yingyinNormal.en: The Valley of Fire is just 50 miles out of town, and the Grand Canyon is a half-a-day drive away.
yingyinNormal.zh: 火焰谷只是离开市中心50 英里，而大峡谷亦只需半天的车程。

yingyinNormal.en: People expect you to party and be wild, sleep with whoever you want, run away, come back.
yingyinNormal.zh: 大家都认为你天天有聚会，生活放荡随便和人睡觉，然后离开，再回来。

yingyinNormal.en: So I went away for a while to try to find some authenticity. And I did it, okay? I found it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以我离开了一阵子试着去寻找真实。我成功了 知道吗，我找到了。

yingyinNormal.en: Moving away from the historic center, London's trendy suburbs offer a different kind of story.
yingyinNormal.zh: 离开历史建筑群，到达伦敦周边充满时尚感的区域，又是另一番景象。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 在...距离处; 间隔...时间

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 颁发；(体育比赛)处于劣势；泄露；捐赠；赠送
做某事后觉得；分离；脱离
外出度假；走开；离开；逃脱
强行拉走；强迫...离开；迫使停止

examination_example.sentence: Planning documents pledged that the great legacy of the Games would be to lever a nation of sport lovers <highlight>away</highlight> from their couches.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 规划文件保证，奥运会的伟大遗产，将是促使全国的体育爱好者，离开自家的沙发，出去锻炼。

examination_example.sentence: Readers are migrating <highlight>away</highlight> from print anyway.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 无论如何，读者们正在逐渐远离印刷制品。

examination_example.sentence: Stay <highlight>away</highlight> from commercial advertisers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 远离商业广告。

examination_example.sentence: Ants keep predatory insects <highlight>away</highlight> from where their aphids feed; Gmail keeps the spammers out of our inboxes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 蚂蚁让食肉昆虫远离蚜虫的觅食处；Gmail使垃圾邮件发送者远离我们的收件箱。

examination_example.sentence: Could a hug a day keep the doctor <highlight>away</highlight>?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一天一个拥抱能让医生远离我们吗？

examination_example.sentence: The man is there to feed the dog, and the dog is there to keep the man <highlight>away</highlight> from the machines.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人在那里喂狗，狗在那里让人远离机器。

examination_example.sentence: The Victorians suddenly seem to become more human as the hundred-or-so years that separate us fade <highlight>away</highlight> through our common experience of laughter.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 维多利亚时代的人似乎突然变得更有人情味了，因为共同的笑声经历让我们之间相隔的100多年渐渐消失了。

examination_example.sentence: While the government's commitment to long-term funding may have changed, the very pressing need for more affordable housing is real and is not going <highlight>away</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 虽然政府对长期融资的承诺可能已经改变，但对更多经济适用房的迫切需求是真实的，而且不会消失。

examination_example.sentence: Certain jobs have gone <highlight>away</highlight> for good, outmoded by machines.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有些工作已经永远消失了，因为它们被机器淘汰了。

examination_example.sentence: When given the option to offer up details about yourself or studiously stash them <highlight>away</highlight>, you should just be honest.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当你可以选择提供自己的细节，或刻意隐藏它们时，你应该诚实点。

examination_example.sentence: The strategy aims to ensure that carbon in woody material removed from the forests is locked <highlight>away</highlight> in the form of solid lumber.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 该战略要确保从森林中移除的木本材料内的碳以固定木材的形式封存好。

examination_example.sentence: My mind seems to be able to cope and the information is stored <highlight>away</highlight> neatly.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我的大脑似乎能够处理这些问题，信息也被整齐地储存起来。

examination_example.sentence: Americans buy roughly 20 billion garments a year and no matter how much they give <highlight>away</highlight>, this excess leads to waste.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 美国人每年大约购买200亿件衣服，不管他们捐出去多少，多余的衣服都会产生浪费。

examination_example.sentence: We shy <highlight>away</highlight> from casual interactions with strangers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们因害怕而避免和陌生人进行随意的互动。

examination_example.sentence: Take <highlight>away</highlight> babies' appetite.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 夺走婴儿的食欲。

examination_example.sentence: British land artists preferred to get <highlight>away</highlight> from towns.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 英国的地景艺术家更喜欢离开城镇。

examination_example.sentence: But most people will come <highlight>away</highlight> from this book believing it was money well spent.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但大多数人读完这本书后认为这是值得花的钱。

examination_example.sentence: The poor farm kid torn <highlight>away</highlight> from his home.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 那个被迫背井离乡的可怜农家小孩。

examination_example.sentence: But you'll reap benefits such as less anxiety and improved sleep right <highlight>away</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是你会马上获得好处，比如减少焦虑和改善睡眠。

sense_info_list.en: to or at a distance from a particular place, person, or thing
at or to a great distance in space or time
sense_info_list.zh: 在...距离处; 间隔...时间

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Looking <highlight>away</highlight> from the hiring manager.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 把目光从招聘经理身上移开。

examination_example.sentence: The plan was to reduce prices to move the stock, arguably encouraging consumers to buy and throw <highlight>away</highlight> with little thought.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 该计划是通过降价来转移库存，可以说是鼓励消费者不假思索地购买和丢弃。

sense_info_list.en: at or to a great distance in space or time

examination_example.sentence: The further <highlight>away</highlight> an idea is from your current position, the more likely you are to reject it outright.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一个想法离你现在的位置越远，你就越有可能彻底拒绝它。

examination_example.sentence: France's beloved cathedral only minutes <highlight>away</highlight> from complete destruction.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 法国受人喜爱的大教堂离彻底毁灭只有几分钟的时间。

examination_example.sentence: I think we're a long way <highlight>away</highlight> from having virtual beings that have the ability to pre-sell content.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我认为，我们距离拥有能够预售内容的虚拟实体还有很长的路要走。

examination_example.sentence: You can't expect someone to change their mind if you take <highlight>away</highlight> their community too.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 即便你让他们离开所属的群体，也不能指望他们会改变主意。

examination_example.sentence: Such levies are no universal remedy as the amounts raised would be tiny compared with what has been taken <highlight>away</highlight> by government.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这类税收并不是万能的，因为与政府征收的税收相比，征收的金额微不足道。

examination_example.sentence: Do <highlight>away</highlight> with jargon terms.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不要使用行话术语。

sample.mean: prep. & adv. 沿着；顺着；循；延伸；带来；与…一起；在…期间；进展

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 表示“相对”

word_usage.usage:
away为方位副词，表“离开”，不用于比较级。
示例：Sorry, he's away.
对不起，他不在。

away用在back, behind, below, off等词前，指“相去得远地”。
示例：He came to China away back in 2000.
他早在2000年就来中国了。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: A white sheep named Prickles that ran <highlight>away</highlight> from an Australian farm during the 2013 bushfires, recently returned home.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在2013年的丛林大火中，一只名叫Prickles的白色绵羊从澳大利亚的一个农场跑了出来，最近回到了家。

examination_example.sentence: It ran <highlight>away</highlight> into a nearby forest.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它跑进了附近的森林。

examination_example.sentence: Invasive species are driving <highlight>away</highlight> certain native species.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 入侵物种正在赶走某些本土物种。

examination_example.sentence: The arguments against physical education have included concerns that gym time may be taking <highlight>away</highlight> from study time.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 反对体育教育的理由包括担心健身时间可能会占用学习时间。

examination_example.sentence: Does this mean we should do <highlight>away</highlight> with all the praise?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这是否意味着我们应该放弃所有的赞美？

examination_example.sentence: If took all that <highlight>away</highlight>, how much extra time would we suddenly find in our life?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果把这些都拿走了，我们的生活会突然多出多少时间？

examination_example.sentence: Increased use of digital devices steals <highlight>away</highlight> children's playtime.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 越来越多的数码设备偷走了孩子们的游戏时间。

sense_info_list.en: at or to a great distance in space or time

examination_example.sentence: Oh, it's 15 kilometers <highlight>away</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 哦，有15公里远。

examination_example.sentence: Small schools consolidated into larger ones, meaning more students were farther <highlight>away</highlight> from home.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 小学校合并成大学校，意味着更多的学生离家更远。

examination_example.sentence: They grabbed the phone and called back right <highlight>away</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们抓起电话，立即回了电话。

examination_example.sentence: The real danger here is that children who will completely able to do math at a normal level may keep <highlight>away</highlight> from it because they feel anxious.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这里真正的危险是，完全能够以正常水平做数学的孩子可能会因为感到焦虑而远离数学。

examination_example.sentence: They turned public attention <highlight>away</highlight> from the health risks of sugar to fat.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们把公众的注意力从糖的健康风险转移到脂肪上。

examination_example.sentence: Nowadays, it seems none of can get <highlight>away</highlight> from income inequality.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如今，似乎所有人都无法摆脱收入不平等。

examination_example.sentence: Many scholars have insisted that time online does not necessarily take <highlight>away</highlight> time spent engaging with traditional media or on other activities.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 许多学者坚持认为，上网时间并不一定会占用花在传统媒体或其他活动上的时间。

examination_example.sentence: Should parents and teachers take <highlight>away</highlight> teens' smartphones and replace them with paper books?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 家长和老师应该拿走青少年的智能手机，用纸质书取而代之吗？

word_usage.usage:
away为方位副词，表“离开”，不用于比较级。
示例：Sorry, he's away.
对不起，他不在。

away用在back, behind, below, off等词前，指“相去得远地”。
示例：He came to China away back in 2000.
他早在2000年就来中国了。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 赠送；错失(机会等)；泄露(秘密等)
扔掉；丢弃；浪费(机会、优势或好处)
离开；避开；使离开；使避开

examination_example.sentence: I hear he'll be <highlight>away</highlight> tomorrow.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我听说他明天要走了。

examination_example.sentence: Some plants pump out smelly chemicals to keep insects <highlight>away</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一些植物排出有臭味的化学物质来驱赶昆虫。

examination_example.sentence: I'm looking for someone to take it while I'm <highlight>away</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我想找个人在我外出时拿着它。

sense_info_list.en: at or to a great distance in space or time

examination_example.sentence: In short, he loves postcards, and the excitement of getting a hand-written note from someone far <highlight>away</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 简而言之，他喜欢明信片，以及收到远方某人手写的便条时的兴奋感。

examination_example.sentence: Did you say the repair shop was three blocks <highlight>away</highlight> from here?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你是说修理店离这里有三个街区远吗？

examination_example.sentence: Having your grandchildren far <highlight>away</highlight> is hard, especially knowing your adult child is struggling.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 让你的孙辈远离家乡是很困难的，尤其是知道你的成年子女正在奋斗。

examination_example.sentence: Imaginative ideas die <highlight>away</highlight> if not taken in time.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 富有想象力的想法如果不及时采纳就会消失。

examination_example.sentence: Freddy passed <highlight>away</highlight> on Thanksgiving.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Freddy在感恩节去世了。

examination_example.sentence: When neither of these methods removed the static noise, I would sit helplessly and wait for the noise to go <highlight>away</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当这两种方法都不能消除静电噪音时，我会无奈地坐在那里，等待噪音消失。

sense_info_list.en: in or into a proper place (especially for storage or safekeeping

examination_example.sentence: You are responsible for washing out your own lab equipment and putting it <highlight>away</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你有责任把自己的实验室设备洗干净并放好。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 颁发；(体育比赛)处于劣势；泄露；泄密
逃脱；脱落；摆脱...控制；领先
突然离开；逃离；逃避；避免正视
带着…逃离；把…用掉；轻易接受（他人的想法）；战胜；制伏；不受…的约束
运走；抬走；搬走；不能自制
轻易脱身；随便（或不负责任地）离开

examination_example.sentence: The enemies were frightened by the noise and ran <highlight>away</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 敌人被响声吓到，然后逃跑了。

examination_example.sentence: Who wants to eat food that is thrown <highlight>away</highlight> as waste?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 谁想吃被当作垃圾扔掉的食物呢？

examination_example.sentence: Each white petal carries a seed <highlight>away</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 每一片白色花瓣都会带走一颗种子。

examination_example.sentence: Step <highlight>away</highlight> from the screen.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 离屏幕远一点。

examination_example.sentence: It refers to staying <highlight>away</highlight> from crowded places to prevent the spread of COVID-19.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它指的是远离人群拥挤的地方，以防止新冠肺炎病毒的传播。

examination_example.sentence: The 5G technology can help doctors treat patients who are hundreds of kilometers <highlight>away</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 5G技术可以帮助医生治疗数百公里外的患者。

examination_example.sentence: Put <highlight>away</highlight> your smartphones, and read for at least 30 minutes, every day!
examination_example.sentence_trans: 收起你的智能手机，每天至少阅读30分钟！

examination_example.sentence: "That's all because you  didn't put <highlight>away</highlight> the food properly last night."said Mr.Lee.
examination_example.sentence_trans: “那都是因为你昨晚没有把食物放好。”李先生说。

examination_example.sentence: A good education is something that no one can take <highlight>away</highlight> from you.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 良好的教育是任何人都无法从你身上夺走的东西。

examination_example.sentence: So failure means taking something <highlight>away</highlight> from the experience.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 因此，失败意味着从经验中带走一些东西。

examination_example.sentence: A salesman would find him, take the toy <highlight>away</highlight> and put it back on the shelf.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一个售货员会找到他，把玩具拿走并放回货架上。

examination_example.sentence: I'm sad to hear that Yuan Longping passed <highlight>away</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 听到袁隆平去世的消息，我很难过。

examination_example.sentence: What was Gu Fangzhou's age when he passed <highlight>away</highlight>?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 顾方舟去世时有多大？

examination_example.sentence: It was his first time to smile after his wife passed <highlight>away</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这是他在妻子去世后第一次笑。

examination_example.sentence: give <highlight>away</highlight> food to them
examination_example.sentence_trans: 向他们赠送食物

examination_example.sentence: Fudan University has also given <highlight>away</highlight> more than 10 million yuan to the region.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 复旦大学也向该地区捐赠了1000多万元人民币。

examination_example.sentence: He flew back right <highlight>away</highlight> to ask the other two for help.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他立刻飞回来向另外两个人寻求帮助。

examination_example.sentence: Mobile phones switched off and put <highlight>away</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 手机关机并收好。

examination_example.sentence: I will do it right <highlight>away</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我马上就去做。

word_usage.usage:
away为方位副词，表“离开”，不用于比较级。
示例：Sorry, he's away.
对不起，他不在。

away用在back, behind, below, off等词前，指“相去得远地”。
示例：He came to China away back in 2000.
他早在2000年就来中国了。
